name: Mark D
text: Placed the order 1.5 hours before we were going to pick it up. The crust was maybe cooked half way and the sauce tasted as if went bad. This order was placed during off peak hours so no excuses for this poor performance in a simple task.

text: I choose delivery of my Pizza Hut Pizza. Very simple to use website. I had accumulated enough points for a no charge medium any type of pizza for free. I would have voted 5 stars but since free pizza means you have to order $15.00 of sides ‚Ä¶More

text: The website stated a 20-30 minute delivery time, but once i completed the order it went to 55-65 min.  Food was cold by the time it arrived.

name: LARRY THUROW
text: Great selection. I had the stuffed cheese rolls and the garlic parmesan chicken wings. They were both great. Fast prompt service. Definitely be back.

name: Eric Loebel
text: Multiple deliveries have had a wait time of 2 hours. The pizza is good, and orders have always been accurate; however with wait times like this it simply doesn‚Äôt make sense to offer delivery and charge a fee for it. It would be best to offer this as a take-out only location.

name: Todd Schwartz
text: We stopped into Pizza Hut for lunch and really liked the pizza. They also had a simple but fresh salad bar with all the classic choices. The wait staff was very nice, and checked in on us frequently and kept our drinks full. We liked the clean restaurant, and the price was very affordable.

name: stan livingston
text: Good service

name: Jeff Frazer
text: Can't cut the pizza. No cheese at all. Just disappointed in every aspect. I'm so glad I picked it up instead of paying for delivery. I'm working out of town staying in a hotel I'm just eating whatever I can rip off of it at this point.

text: Pizza was fresh and hot and the employees helpful and courteous.
